actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

official_title: Honoring the first responders who acted swiftly on Sunday, January 16, 2022, to ensure the safety of the residents affected by tornadoes that struck southwest Florida.

summary.text: This resolution thanks the first responders of southwest Florida for their actions during the tornadoes of January 16, 2022.

titles.title: Honoring the first responders who acted swiftly on Sunday, January 16, 2022, to ensure the safety of the residents affected by tornadoes that struck southwest Florida.
